projects.description: This app displays a random famous quote each time a button is clicked.
In this app, student information is dynamically displayed from a data file. Users can click through each page to see new students.
In this app, I used JavaScript to create a more user-friendly registration form for a tech conference.

This app is a browser-based, word guessing game called 'Phrase Hunter.' I useed JavaScript and OOP (Object-Oriented Programming) to select a random, hidden phrase, which a player tries to guess, by clicking letters on an onscreen keyboard.
